topic.title: Keeping safe
topic.body: How the hell you meant to keep safe with this? I clicked one link wanted to run from the content but the content was not fully stored on my drive, yes nice no central hub but bad for anything else.

1_172ALy9XgaQ3gJUx5zVzgeqp2oLsAoqo6m.body:
> [rythyrix](#comment_64_18eGWSaM3Vc9i61LVfogjQJf5gp7EN7b9Y): Disassociate your clearnet aliases from your ZeroID?

Well if you know anything about computers then you know its not that simple, hard drives love to hold files even after been deleted, when it installed it should offer a virutal ram drive, some of us geeks DO have the space to seed/mirror a few sites without a problem in ram, I know I do.

But without my eyes will no longer be clean, tor has its dark places but they was never that open and just a click waiting to happen, well what was seen can't be unseen but darn not happy.
